narrative: During takeoff roll, the aircraft experienced a brief loss of power. The crew rejected takeoff and returned to the ramp without further issues.
A hard landing occurred after gusty crosswinds. The aircraft sustained minor damage to the landing gear and was towed from the runway.
Crew reported an intermittent avionics failure mid-flight. The flight returned to base and landed safely.
While taxiing, the crew noted a strong fuel odor and shut down the engine. Maintenance later found a loose fuel line fitting.
The aircraft encountered icing on approach. The pilot executed a go-around, then landed safely.
